snippet.title: Universe for Sale - Official Environment Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Take a tour of the sci-fi world of Universe For Sale in this latest trailer for the upcoming hand-drawn adventure game. Travel to Jupiter when Universe For Sale launches on PC in 2023. 
A space station nestled in the clouds of Jupiter. A bizarre bazaar where a young, worried woman crafts entire universes in the palm of her hand. A mysterious cultist who's stripped the flesh from his bones in order to reach enlightenment. Here, there's a universe for sale. You buying?

#IGN #Gaming #gamescom
